MAGICITEMS.CHARGES_HINT: If this spell will be cast using charges from the parent item, configure the number of charges above.

MAGICITEMS.MISSING_ITEM_DESCRIPTION: This Spell's original item could not be found. Maybe it was deleted?
MAGICITEMS.QUERY_ALSO_DELETE: Would you also like to delete the spells from that item?

MAGICITEMS.SETTINGS.ITEM_EXCLUSION.TITLE: Item Type Exclusion Menu
MAGICITEMS.SETTINGS.SORT_ORDER.HINT: If checked, spellbook sections added by this module will be put at the bottom of the spellbook tab, rather than the top.
MAGICITEMS.SETTINGS.SORT_ORDER.NAME: Spellbook Sort Order
MAGICITEMS.SPELL_LEVEL_HINT: If this spell is to be cast at a specific level, configure the level above.
MAGICITEMS.WARN_ALSO_DELETE: This will also delete the Spell from the Actor. Are you certain you want to delete the embedded spell?
MAGICITEMS.WARN_CANNOT_ADDREMOVE: An Owned Item's spells cannot be added to or removed from. These spells have been added to the Actor's Spellbook Tab.
MAGICITEMS.WARN_OWNED: You are editing an owned Item's spells, any changes made here will not be applied to the spells on the owning actor.
